description: MCP server for conducting dynamic, conversational surveys with structured data collection.

MCP_LOG_LEVEL.description: Sets the minimum log level for output (e.g., 'debug', 'info', 'warn').

SURVEY_DEFINITIONS_PATH.description: Path to the directory containing survey definition files.

SURVEY_RESPONSES_PATH.description: Path to the directory where survey responses are stored.

MCP_HTTP_HOST.description: The hostname for the HTTP server.

MCP_HTTP_PORT.description: The port to run the HTTP server on.

MCP_HTTP_ENDPOINT_PATH.description: The endpoint path for the MCP server.
